title: firmware patches
extract: Patches are the equivalent of firmware in the software space. Patch management is the process of applying patches or upgrades for software applications. Sometimes referred to as bug fixes, patches typically improve the usability and performance of an application and address any issues or security vulnerabilities.Dec 1, 2017
